main event: A bright disc-shaped object larger than an aircraft was sighted hovering over the Baker, Montana municipal airport for approximately 1.5 minutes before suddenly disappearing to the southeast.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright, glowing light, about the size of the observer's thumbnail held at arm's length.
The object moved at a fantastic speed across the sky before suddenly disappearing without any gradual dimming or fading.
The observer had seen many aircraft and satellites before but this sighting was quite different and unlike anything they had seen.
The observer reported the sighting to the local Air Force base, who indicated they had received several similar reports but did not offer any explanation.
Another sighting was reported on the same day by the Miles City sheriff and a local citizen, who saw a large, square-shaped object with lights hovering low over a ranch area for 3-4 minutes.
sighted object: bright, disc-shaped object larger than an aircraft
witnesses: civilian witness, sheriff and other individuals
